title: <file_name> is treated as local but is inside a node_modules directory
body:
### Version of Hardhat

2.16.1

### What happened?

While trying to compile a contract in a hardhat project, I received this error. I see that this issue has been raised before but is closed as resolved. It appears to be tracked on Linear but it seems outside users don't have access to this workspace. 

### Minimal reproduction steps

Error HH1006: The file /Users/coopermaira/Documents/GitHub/ethernaut-master/attempt1/node_modules/eth-gas-reporter/mock/contracts/ConvertLib.sol is treated as local but is inside a node_modules directory
